1. Download project.zip from StudIp
2. Extract the ZIP at your home folder ~/
3. Inspect ~/project/example/test.cpp for the API
4. Test the API using the "simulator"
open two terminals

first terminal for simulator:
cd ~/project/dummy/
make clean; make; ./dummy

second terminal for testcode:
cd ~/project/example/
make clean; make; ./test
Attention: train_reportSpeed not working properly in simulator!

5. Simulator successful ? Test it on hardware
6. Write your own code and test it
